preqs: MTE2544 or MSC2022 or TRC3800 or MSC2111 or PHS2011

rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MSC2022, MSC2111, MTE2544, PHS2011, TRC3800}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MSC3011, MSC3132, MTE3508}

description: Electrical and optical properties of materials - dielectrics, ferroelectrics, superconductors and optical fibres; magnetic properties - microscopic origin of magnetism in specific classes of materials, domains, magnet fabrication and applications; nanodevices which rely on the preceding properties, experimental techniques.
